# LiquidSat - First Self-Custodial, Cross-Chain BTCFi Protocol

## About
LiquidSat is the first self-custodial, cross-chain BTCFi protocol that unlocks native BTC liquidity without bridges, custodians, or wrapped assets. Lock BTC on Bitcoin, get stablecoins instantly via script-based escrow. Your keys. Your BTC. Your yield.

## Core Value Proposition
"Your BTC. Your Yield. No Wraps." - Make your Bitcoin work for you without leaving Bitcoin.

## Main Features
- Native BTC script locks (no wrapped BTC)
- Self-custodial protocol
- Cross-chain liquidity without bridges
- Instant stablecoin loans against BTC
- On-chain risk engine
- Pre-signed settlements
- Deterministic loan outcomes
- Non-custodial by default

## Key Differentiators
- No wrapped assets (no wBTC, no bridges)
- Bitcoin-native script-based escrow
- Self-custody throughout entire process
- Funds move only after approvals and BTC lock
- Verifiable on-chain transactions
- Powered by Bitcoin scripts, not bridges
- True Bitcoin security by design

## Use Cases
- Borrow stablecoins without selling BTC
- Lend BTC to earn yield (self-custodial)
- Unlock BTC capital efficiency
- Access cross-chain liquidity natively
- Keep BTC exposure while accessing liquidity

## Technology Architecture
- Native Bitcoin script locks
- Cross-chain proofs without wrapped assets
- Automated on-chain risk monitoring
- Pre-signed settlement transactions
- Self-custodial smart contract logic
- Deterministic liquidation protection

## Target Audience
- Bitcoin maximalists seeking self-custody
- BTC holders wanting yield without wrapping
- DeFi users tired of bridge risks
- Long-term HODLers needing liquidity
- Developers building on Bitcoin L2s
- BTCFi ecosystem participants

## Key Information
- Category: BTCFi Protocol
- Type: Self-Custodial, Cross-Chain
- Website: https://liquidsat.com
- Focus: Native BTC liquidity without bridges
- Ecosystem: CoreDAO, Bitcoin L2s

> For detailed documentation, visit https://liquidsat.com/llms-full.txt
